roleset.name: cause to create an abnormal passageway

example.name: With arg 0
example.text: We discussed the risk of attempting to remove the prostate from the rectal mass, as this may leave tumor behind and has the potential PRO to fistulize with his history of cancer as well as radiation.

roleset.note: FISTULIZE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Shap data. No Comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from fistulize.01-v)
